# $getPathParams

介绍
基础用法

直接调用即可，返回一个参数对象

$getPathParams();

export function $getPathParams() {
  let url = decodeURI(location.search);
  let params = {};
  if (url.indexOf("?") != -1) {
    let str = url.substr(1);
    let strs = str.split("&");
    for (let i = 0; i < strs.length; i++) {
      params[strs[i].split("=")[0]] = strs[i].split("=")[1];
    }
  }
  return params;
}
显示代码
